title: Characterization of organic species and functional groups in pollen, fungi, algae, and bacteria bioaerosols
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00083H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Palina Bahdanovich, Kevin Axelrod, Andrey Y. Khlystov, Vera Samburova
Little is known about the chemical composition of bioaerosols (pollen, fungi, algae, bacteria). In this study, several bioaerosols were characterized for their functional groups with 1H-NMR and were quantitatively analyzed for individual organics.
